sentences.en: At first I felt very resentful and angry about losing my job.
sentences.cn: 起初我对丢掉工作感到非常怨恨和恼怒。

sentences.en: He felt deeply resentful towards his ex - wife .
sentences.cn: 他对 前妻 怨恨极深.

sentences.en: He turned away in sullen, resentful silence.
sentences.cn: 他闷闷不乐、心怀怨恨、一言不发地转过身去了。

sentences.en: He was very resentful of their success.
sentences.cn: 他对他们的成功愤愤不平.

sentences.en: Her beautiful face had a resentful frown on it.
sentences.cn: 她那俊俏的眉梢怨恨地蹙了起来.

sentences.en: His eyes were somber, resentful and yet nervous.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛显得阴沉 、 愤懑,然而又惶惶不安.

sentences.en: I recognized the blank , resentful stair of incomprehension in her eyes.
sentences.cn: 我在她的眼睛里看到一种茫然的 、 忿恨的难以理解的眼光.

sentences.en: I recognized the blank , resentful stare of incomprehension in her eyes.
sentences.cn: 我在她的眼睛里看到一种茫然的, 忿恨地难以理解的眼光.

sentences.en: I was too grand; too snobbish, even, he said, sharply resentful.
sentences.cn: 我太傲慢 、 太势利 、 甚至于他说过于愤世嫉俗了.

sentences.en: Many of them remained sullen and resentful.
sentences.cn: 他们中有许多人还是闷闷不乐，怀恨在心。

sentences.en: She felt resentful at the way she had been treated.
sentences.cn: 她对所受到的对待恼怒不已.

sentences.en: She was resentful of the way of his speaking.
sentences.cn: 她对他的讲话方式不满.

sentences.en: The worker on the assembly line is resentful of the managers.
sentences.cn: 站在生产线旁劳动的工人们对于管理人员总是抱有反感.

sentences.en: They seemed to be resentful of our presence there.
sentences.cn: 他们好像对我们在那里露面很生气。

sentences.en: They're resentful that outsiders presume to meddle in their affairs.
sentences.cn: 他们对外人擅自干预他们的事务非常愤慨。

trans.tran_cn: 感到愤恨的，表示愤恨的，厌恶的，易发脾气的，易怒的
trans.tran_en: feeling angry and upset about something that you think is unfair
